body_html:
@soumith @apaszke
I think I have a solution, not sure it is the best, but I can create a PR
I am aware of https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md is there something else I need to know?
Also I assume I should add that to this module https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/nn/modules/loss.py, is that correct?

I think I have a solution, not sure it is the best, but I can create a PR
